Title: Avian Masterworks
Description: A multi-year study into the aerodynamics, social structures, and preservation of the world's most majestic bird species.

Title: The Apex Series
Description: Intimate, high-contrast encounters with the world's most formidable predators in the high country.

Title: The Coastal Archive
Description: Exploring the resilient spirits found at the intersection of land and sea.

Title: Studies & Legacy
Description: Intimate works on paper, colored pencil studies, and earlier explorations in color and form.
